content: Posted an actually custom coded MantiBot (for real this time)
title: Topics
description: These roles are for general topics you want to be pinged about

fields.name: 🎮Gaming Invitations
fields.value: A role that can be pinged for general gaming get-togethers in #game-invitations

fields.name: <:zeus:1165281721764282379>  Mission Design
fields.value: Can be used to ping people for general topics in the mission making channels, such as #design-discussion.

fields.name: 🛩️ Flying
fields.value: Gives you access to the flight sim chat where flying is discussed and game sessions are organised.

fields.name: 🏎️ Racing
fields.value: Gives you access to the racing chat where racing is discussed and gaming session are organised.
